articles.author: Dan Lamothe
articles.title: Army report on Trump’s Arlington Cemetery visit cites ‘simple assault’ - The Washington Post
articles.description: The report was obtained and published by the nonprofit American Oversight, which sued for the records.
articles.content: An Army report released by a government transparency organization late Friday described an altercation at Arlington National Cemetery involving Trump campaign staff members as a simple assault, and a… [+341 chars]
